title: AI Help Chat
subtitle: Describe your issue and Nexus will help you solve it.
initialMessage: Hello! I'm Nexus, your AI assistant. How can I help you today?

suggestions.title: Quick Suggestions
items: How to create a new ticket?
How to view my previous tickets?
I have a problem with my equipment

prefilled.materialInvestigation: I would like to start an investigation on equipment.

ai.name: Nexus
ai.greeting: Hello! How can I help you?
ai.error: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
ai.cannotHelp: I can't fully solve this issue. Would you like to create a ticket for a human agent to assist you?
ai.ticketSuggestion: Based on our conversation, I recommend creating a ticket for a human agent.

voice.notSupported: Your browser does not support voice recognition

createTicket.title: Create Ticket
createTicket.subtitle: Create a ticket based on this conversation

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.

planLimits.voiceNotAvailable: Voice features are not available with your current plan.
